segments.source_content: # Configuration

translations.zh-CN: # 配置

segments.source_content: import TOCInline from '@theme/TOCInline';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_10c4cb47

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has a unique take on configurations. We encourage you to congregate information about your site into one place. We guard the fields of this file and facilitate making this data object accessible across your site.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 对配置有独特的处理方式。我们建议您将站点信息集中在一处管理。我们会保护该配置文件的字段，并确保这个数据对象能在整个站点中便捷访问。

segments.source_content: Keeping a well-maintained `docusaurus.config.js` helps you, your collaborators, and your open source contributors to be able to focus on documentation while still being able to customize the site.

translations.zh-CN: 维护良好的 `docusaurus.config.js` 能让您、协作者和开源贡献者专注于文档编写，同时仍能灵活定制站点。

segments.source_content: ## What goes into a `docusaurus.config.js`? {#what-goes-into-a-docusaurusconfigjs}

translations.zh-CN: ## `docusaurus.config.js` 包含哪些内容？ {#what-goes-into-a-docusaurusconfigjs}

segments.source_content: You should not have to write your `docusaurus.config.js` from scratch even if you are developing your site. All templates come with a `docusaurus.config.js` that includes defaults for the common options.

translations.zh-CN: 即使您正在开发站点，也无需从零编写 `docusaurus.config.js`。所有模板都自带包含常用选项默认值的配置文件。

segments.source_content: However, it can be helpful if you have a high-level understanding of how the configurations are designed and implemented.

translations.zh-CN: 但了解配置的设计和实现原理仍对您有所帮助。

segments.source_content: The high-level overview of Docusaurus configuration can be categorized into:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 配置的高层概述可分为以下几类：

segments.source_content: <TOCInline toc={toc} minHeadingLevel={3} maxHeadingLevel={3} />

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1485a88b

segments.source_content: For exact reference to each of the configurable fields, you may refer to [**`docusaurus.config.js` API reference**](api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx).

translations.zh-CN: 具体每个可配置字段的详细说明，请参阅 [**`docusaurus.config.js` API 参考文档**](api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ### Site metadata {#site-metadata}

translations.zh-CN: ### 站点元数据 {#site-metadata}

segments.source_content: Site metadata contains the essential global metadata such as `title`, `url`, `baseUrl`, and `favicon`.

translations.zh-CN: 站点元数据包含核心全局信息，如 `title`（标题）、`url`（网址）、`baseUrl`（基础路径）和 `favicon`（网站图标）。

segments.source_content: They are used in several places such as your site's title and headings, browser tab icon, social sharing (Facebook, X) information or even to generate the correct path to serve your static files.

translations.zh-CN: 这些信息会用于多个场景：站点标题和页眉、浏览器标签页图标、社交媒体分享（Facebook、X）信息，甚至是生成静态文件的正确路径。

segments.source_content: ### Deployment configurations {#deployment-configurations}

translations.zh-CN: ### 部署配置 {#deployment-configurations}

segments.source_content: Deployment configurations such as `projectName`, `organizationName`, and optionally `deploymentBranch` are used when you deploy your site with the `deploy` command.

translations.zh-CN: 部署配置如 `projectName`（项目名称）、`organizationName`（组织名称）及可选的 `deploymentBranch`（部署分支），会在使用 `deploy` 命令部署站点时被调用。

segments.source_content: It is recommended to check the [deployment docs](deployment.mdx) for more information.

translations.zh-CN: 建议查阅 [部署文档](deployment.mdx) 获取更多信息。

segments.source_content: ### Theme, plugin, and preset configurations {#theme-plugin-and-preset-configurations}

translations.zh-CN: ### 主题、插件和预设配置 {#theme-plugin-and-preset-configurations}

segments.source_content: List the [themes](./using-plugins.mdx#using-themes), [plugins](./using-plugins.mdx), and [presets](./using-plugins.mdx#using-presets) for your site in the `themes`, `plugins`, and `presets` fields, respectively. These are typically npm packages:

translations.zh-CN: 分别在 `themes`、`plugins` 和 `presets` 字段中列出站点的[主题](./using-plugins.mdx#using-themes)、[插件](./using-plugins.mdx)和[预设](./using-plugins.mdx#using-presets)。这些通常是 npm 包：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_bca33820

segments.source_content: They can also be loaded from local directories:

translations.zh-CN: 也可以从本地目录加载：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_67b24fc5

segments.source_content: To specify options for a plugin or theme, replace the name of the plugin or theme in the config file with an array containing the name and an options object:

translations.zh-CN: 要为插件或主题指定选项，请在配置文件中将插件/主题名称替换为包含名称和选项对象的数组：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_a89f84e1

segments.source_content: To specify options for a plugin or theme that is bundled in a preset, pass the options through the `presets` field. In this example, `docs` refers to `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs` and `theme` refers to `@docusaurus/theme-classic`.

translations.zh-CN: 要为预设中捆绑的插件或主题指定选项，需通过 `presets` 字段传递选项。下例中，`docs` 指代 `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs`，`theme` 指代 `@docusaurus/theme-classic`。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_890e01bc

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The `presets: [['classic', {...}]]` shorthand works as well.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

`presets: [['classic', {...}]]` 的简写形式同样有效。

:::

segments.source_content: For further help configuring themes, plugins, and presets, see [Using Plugins](./using-plugins.mdx).

translations.zh-CN: 有关配置主题、插件和预设的更多帮助，请参阅[使用插件](./using-plugins.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ### Custom configurations {#custom-configurations}

translations.zh-CN: ### 自定义配置 {#custom-configurations}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus guards `docusaurus.config.js` from unknown fields. To add custom fields, define them in `customFields`.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 会保护 `docusaurus.config.js` 免受未知字段影响。如需添加自定义字段，请在 `customFields` 中定义。

segments.source_content: ## Accessing configuration from components {#accessing-configuration-from-components}

translations.zh-CN: ## 从组件中访问配置 {#accessing-configuration-from-components}

segments.source_content: Your configuration object will be made available to all the components of your site. And you may access them via React context as `siteConfig`.

translations.zh-CN: 您的配置对象将对站点的所有组件可用。您可以通过 React 上下文以 `siteConfig` 的形式访问它们。

segments.source_content: Basic example:

translations.zh-CN: 基础示例：

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If you just want to use those fields on the client side, you could create your own JS files and import them as ES6 modules, there is no need to put them in `docusaurus.config.js`.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

如果仅需在客户端使用这些字段，您可以创建自己的 JS 文件并通过 ES6 模块导入，无需将其放入 `docusaurus.config.js` 中。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Customizing Babel Configuration {#customizing-babel-configuration}

translations.zh-CN: ## 自定义 Babel 配置 {#customizing-babel-configuration}

segments.source_content: For new Docusaurus projects, we automatically generated a `babel.config.js` in the project root.

translations.zh-CN: 对于新建的 Docusaurus 项目，我们会在项目根目录自动生成 `babel.config.js` 文件。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5010ec34

segments.source_content: Most of the time, this configuration will work just fine. If you want to customize your Babel configuration (e.g. to add support for Flow), you can directly edit this file. For your changes to take effect, you need to restart the Docusaurus dev server.

translations.zh-CN: 大多数情况下，此配置可直接使用。如需自定义 Babel 配置（例如添加 Flow 支持），可直接编辑该文件。修改生效需要重启 Docusaurus 开发服务器。
